alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 12:53PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Collier and central Hendry Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1253 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles southeast of Ave Maria to near Hendry Correctional. Movement was northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and possible funnel clouds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Immokalee, Hendry Correctional, Felda, Big Corkscrew Island, Miles City, Keri, Sunniland, Bunker Hill and Lake Trafford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. This activity was also developing in an environment favorable for the formation of funnel clouds. Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio and local media for additional updates and possible warnings.
